name: Clothing for All
goals: Provide warm and comfortable clothing to individuals and families in need.

name: Books for Learning
goals: Enable access to educational resources for underprivileged students and learners.

name: Home Essentials
goals: Support families by donating essential household items to improve daily life.

name: Toys for Joy
goals: Bring happiness to children by donating toys and games to brighten their days.
items: dolls, board games, puzzles, action figures

name: Electronics Donation
goals: Help bridge the digital divide by donating functional electronics to those in need.

name: Food for Families
goals: Combat hunger by providing essential food supplies to families in need.
items: canned goods, rice, pasta, cooking oil, snacks
